00044 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00045 #include "CmdInsertTracker.h"
00046 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00047 #include "SceneModel.h"
00048 #include "Trace.h"
00049 #include "tgf.h"
00050 #include "TTracker.h"
00051 
00052 CmdInsertTracker::CmdInsertTracker( TTracker* tracker,  const QModelIndex& parentIndex, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00053 : QUndoCommand("Insert Tracker", parent), m_tracker ( tracker ), m_coinParent( 0 ), m_pModel( model )
00054 {
00055         Trace trace( "CmdInsertTracker::CmdInsertTracker" );
00056         
00057         if( !m_tracker ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertTracker Null tracker." );
00058         m_tracker->ref();
00059         
00060         if( !parentIndex.isValid() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertTracker called with invalid ModelIndex." );
00061         InstanceNode* instanceParent = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00062         m_coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceParent->GetNode() );
00063 }
00064 
00065 CmdInsertTracker::~CmdInsertTracker()
00066 {
00067         Trace trace( "CmdInsertTracker::~CmdInsertTracker" );
00068         m_tracker->unref();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void CmdInsertTracker::undo()
00072 {
00073         Trace trace( "CmdInsertTracker::undo" );
00074         m_pModel->RemoveCoinNode( m_row, *m_coinParent );
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CmdInsertTracker::redo()
00078 {
00079         Trace trace( "CmdInsertTracker::redo" );
00080 
00081         m_row = m_pModel->InsertCoinNode( *m_tracker, *m_coinParent );
00082         
00083 }
